name: The Master Enchanter's Chamber
description:
You have entered the Master Enchanter's chamber.  Upon all the walls
here are racks of finely crafted weapons.  A huge chest with a glowing
lock is set to one side.  Several unfinished looking blades rest atop a
small work table.

exits.keywords: door~ 1 -1 2581 S #2583 A Bend In The Hallway~    You are at a bend in a long hallway.  The walls emit a faint magical glow which provides enough light to see by.    The hallway continues north and east.
